short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We Analyze Ecommerce reivews for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verifast analyzer helps you to analyze amazon reviews and tell you if you should trust the reviews.

With Verifastâ€™s AI, you can know how the reviews have fared for any product and if the seller has tricked around to inflate the reviews. We give you Verifast trust score based on which you can take your buying decisions.
We tell you the highlights of the product and how the reviewers feel about them. We also let you understand reviews about any attribute you wish to check. So if you only want to know what people have talked about the softness of a mattress, use our analyzer to ask what people are talking about softness. We will tell you everything about it with the sentiments around it.

You can get same analysis by entering amazon product link on this page: https://verifast.tech/analyzer

Verifast for Chrome is a new and improved version of our Amazon extension. We currently support Amazon India and the US.


Thank you for choosing Verifast. For suggestions or issues write to us at tech@verifast.tech.
